title: Effects on Suicidal Risk With Different Medications
itunes:title: Effects on Suicidal Risk With Different Medications
description:
This episode discusses whether clozapine and other medications can reduce the risk of suicide. Is it a "class effect" of antipsychotics, or is it specific to clozapine? 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 33
  • Effects on Suicidal Risk: Comparison of Clozapine to Other Newer Medicines Indicated to Treat Schizophrenia or Bipolar Disorder
